snippet: The city’s Board of Aldermen voted to advance a measure that would commit the city to spend $150 million for a new football stadium.
abstract: St Louis Board of Aldermen approves financing for new football stadium intended to either keep Rams from leaving city or attract new team; other pro football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The city’s Board of Aldermen voted to advance a measure that would commit the city to spend $150 million for a new football stadium.
